name: Toggl Time Tracker
description: Toggl tracker extension for time management tasks.

preferences.name: Default Workspace
preferences.description: ID of the default workspace you want to use.

preferences.name: Cache Location
preferences.description: Absolute path to cache location. Defaults to extension location.

preferences.name: Hints
preferences.description: Do you want to see hints to help with usage of the application?

preferences.name: API Token
preferences.description: Toggl API token. Will default to environment variable or .togglrc file if not set.

preferences.name: Expiration
preferences.description: Custom expiration time for tracker cache. Same as syntax for duration variable. eg. 1d

preferences.name: Report Format
preferences.description: Default file format to export reports in.
